Title: Varmints
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Kris Mukai, Adam Muto, Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: Dee Bradley Baker, Andrew Daly, Steve Little, Olivia Olson
Plot: Marceline and Bubblegum rekindle an old friendship while fighting off some varmints.
